subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Belmont Stakes
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah will launch his Triple Crown bid from the No. 5 post as the odds-on favorite Saturday in the 147th running of the Belmont Stakes.
snippet: American Pharoah will launch his Triple Crown bid from the No. 5 post as the odds-on favorite Saturday in the 147th running of the Belmont Stakes.
